name: Find The Hero
description:
Find the Hero is a narrative driven Adventure game. The princess is searching for a hero and she will find her hero in the most unlikely of places.

This is a team project for GameDev.Tv Jam 2022 Project team: Neo-Cortex, Shannan Albright, SheepFreak, Nara Malone.

Licensing for source code:  Various assets have different use license and a file detailing those is in the source folder.
